13381.「ああ <pc>さん。おひさしぶりです。\n そろそろ いらっしゃる頃かと思い\:
Oh, <pc>. Long time no see.
I thought you'd be there about now, so
I figured I would try and contact you.

13382.「この間なんて 全然ちがう人に\n 話しかけてしまって ずいぶん 相手を\n お:
Just the other day, I ended up talking to a
completely different person by mistake,
which really gave them a scare.

13383.「あなたと こうして話すのも\n もう けっこうな回数になるのに\n あんな失敗:
I've talked to you quite a few times now, and
to make such a mistake like that...it's quite
embarrassing.

13386.「もし……もし よかったらで\n いいんですけれど……\n 一度 私と 会ってみ:
Would...would you perhaps, be...
Be interested in meeting with me?
If it's okay with you, that is...

13387.「おたがい 相手の顔が わからないので\n 目印となる服装と 待ち合わせ場所を\:
Since neither of us know the other's appearance, I think it would be wise to wear something that stands out and pick
a place to meet.

13388.「……そうですね。<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を装備して\n プクランド大陸:
Yes, okay... Why don't we go to Pukuland and
meet in Fostail Square in Muruel Forest? We'll
both wear a Saffron Hat, too.

13389.「おお よかった！\n 断られるんじゃないかと思って\n ドキドキしちゃいました:
Oh, thank goodness! I was so nervous that you
might reject me.

13390.「じつは 以前から <pc>さんとは\n 直接 会ってみたいと思ってたんです。\:
Actually, I have been wanting to meet
<pc> in person for some time. It
seems you felt the same way.

13391.「おたがいに <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を装備して\n ミュルエルの森のフ:
You will both be equipped with a Saffron Hat
and we will meet at Fostail Square in Muruel
Forest. Don't forget!

13392.「それでは 今日のところは 失礼します。\n お会いできるの 楽しみにしてますか:
Well, if you'll excuse me for today. I look
forward to seeing you soon!

13393.「よかった！……と言いたいところですが\n あなたは 今 たくさんの頼まれごとを:
Good for you! ...but it seems you have a lot
of favors to do right now.

13394.「しかたありません。\n この件は また今度……ということで。:
I can't help it. We'll talk about this another
time.

13395.「……そうですか。残念ですね。\n もし 気が変わったら また\n この鏡に 話:
...I see. I'm sorry to hear that. If you
change your mind, please talk to this mirror
again.

13397.「……あ！ もしかして 直接 会いたいって\n 私の願いを かなえてくださるとか:
Ah! Are you going to grant my wish to meet you
in person?

13398.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>をつけたヤツ……\n 貴様が リュナンだな？:
The one with the Saffron Hat... you must be
Lunan?

13399.「……あで？ おかしいど アニキ。\n 聞いた話だど リュナンって奴は もっと…:
And? You're crazy, big brother. I've heard
that Lunan is more...

13400.「うっせー うっせー！\n メギドローム様は <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を:
Shut up, shut up! Didn't Master Megidrome tell
you to bring me someone with a Saffron Hat on
his head?

13401.「だったら オレら 舎弟は\n 言われたとおりにするだけだろーが！:
Then we, the prefects, will just do as we're
told!

13402.「……あぐぅ。\n そ それも そうなんだな。: Agh... So that's true too, isn't it?

13403.「おい 貴様っ！ メギドローム様の命令だど。\n 一緒に 来てもらうかんな！:
Hey, you! Megidrome sent me. You're coming
with us!

13404.「抵抗しても いいんだぜぇ！\n ただし ようしゃなく たたきのめすケドな！\n:
You can resist all you want. But you have to
break my heart, and I will break yours! Gah-
ha-ha-ha-ha...

13406.「ああ よかった！\n ウルトラ速達便で ここに届けるよう\n 言われて はるば:
Oh, thank God! I was told to deliver it here
via ultra express delivery, so I came all the
way.

13407.「こんな魔物の出る 危険な場所で\n もし 届ける相手が 見つからなかったら\n:
I wondered what I would do if I couldn't find
anyone to deliver it to in such a dangerous
place with monsters!

13408.「うわー どうしよう！\n ウルトラ速達便で ここに届けるよう\n 言われて 来:
Wow! What am I going to do! I was told to
deliver it here via ultra express mail.

13409.「もう 特別料金 もらっちゃってるから\n 放りだすわけにも いかないし……。:
I can't just throw them out since I've already
been paid the special fee...

13410.「いいや！ もう あなたに 託しちゃいます。\n <cs_pchero>って人が:
No! I'm leaving it to you now. If a person
named <cs_pchero> comes along, you give him
to him!

13413.「確かに 渡しましたから！\n では 私は これで失礼しますっ！:
I did give it to you! Now, if you'll excuse
me!

13415.親愛なる <cs_pchero>さんへ\nまず 最初に 謝らせてください。\n今:
Dear <cs_pchero>, First of all, let me
apologize. I'm sorry I couldn't make it today.

13416.ギリギリになって どうしても行けない理由が\nできてしまい 中止を伝えようにも方:
At the last minute, there was a reason I
couldn't make it, and there was no way to tell
them I had to cancel the event.

13417.くわしい事情は シーバの鏡を通して\n説明したいので 申し訳ないのですが\n戻っ:
I would like to explain the details of the
situation through Sheba's mirror, so I
apologize, but would you mind going back?

13418.どうか この手紙が\n無事 あなたの元に 届きますように。\n:
Please pray that this letter reaches you
safely.　　　　　　　　From your friend Lunan

13420.「待ち合わせに 行けなかったばかりか\n 魔物が 私とあなたを まちがえて\n:
Not only did I miss the meeting, but the
monster mistook you for me and attacked us...

13421.「もう お気づきのこととは思いますが\n じつは 私 メギドロームという魔物に\:
I'm sure you are aware by now that I am being
pursued by a monster called Megidrome.

13422.「今回 行けなかったのも 私が\n フォステイル広場に 行くという予定が\n ヤ:
The reason I couldn't go this time is because
he found out I was planning to go to Fostail
Square.

13423.「……でも こっちの勝手な都合ですよね。\n せめてもの おわびの気持ちです。\:
But it's for my own convenience, isn't it? At
the very least, this is my way of apologizing.
Please accept this.

13424.「……今回のことで こりましたよ。\n 魔物にねらわれている身の上で\n 人と会:
This whole thing has made me sick. I was
mistaken to meet with a person when I was
being hunted by a monster.

13425.「……いえ。この鏡での会話も しばらくは\n ひかえた方が いいかもしれませんね:
No...no. I think it might be better to hold
off on this mirror conversation for a while.

13426.「とても なごり惜しいですが……: I am very sorry to hear that...

13427.「あ あなたたちは なんですかっ！？: Why are you guys doing this?

13552.「おう おう また来てくれるとは\n うれしーじゃねえか！: Oh, oh, oh, I'm so glad you're here again!

13553.「連れてこいって 命令なのに\n ブッ倒しちまって どうすんだって\n 困ってた:
We were ordered to bring him in, but we just
knocked him over and were at a loss as to what
to do.

13555.「とにかく 今度こそは\n 一緒に 来てもらうぜぇ！\n 覚悟しなっ！！:
Anyway, this time you're coming with me! I'm
coming with you this time!

41542.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a room containing
a mirror.

41544.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.

41546.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.

41547.「……そうですか そんなことが。\n 重ね重ね すみませんでした。:
...I see...such a thing. I apologize again and
again.
